attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During this time of recession, to hear the excesses of Mp's lifes is deplorable!.Not only during recession but at all times MP'S must be held accountable and then prosecuted if found guilty of fraudulant acction

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
